name: Subaru
networkPartnerships: Working with Toyota on charging infrastructure
Compatible with all major U.S. networks

content.description: Subaru entered the EV market with the Solterra, co-developed with Toyota on the e-TNGA platform. Known for Symmetrical All-Wheel Drive, Subaru brings their off-road capability heritage to the electric SUV segment.
content.evStrategySummary: Focused on AWD electric SUVs with emphasis on safety, capability, and Subaru's signature EyeSight driver assistance. Partnership with Toyota allows shared development costs while maintaining Subaru's brand identity.
